description: This file defines the main 'Home' page component for a food delivery frontend, managing state, fetching restaurant data, and rendering child components like Sidebar and RestaurantList.

methods.name: Home({ search })
methods.description: React functional component that manages state for category, restaurants, and loading, fetches restaurant data on dependencies change, and handles navigation to restaurant menus.

methods.name: navigateToMenu
methods.description: Function that updates browser history to navigate to a specific restaurant's menu and dispatches a popstate event.
